price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߛߋ߫ ߥߟߌ߬ߟߌ߬ߞߏ߬ ߛߌ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߡߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ߓߊ߯ ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
